text: I'm a brave cheater too, flaunting it like that

For those devs who do WP sites, what host are you using for your clients? I used site5 personally (which is terrible since they were bought out awhile back) and thinking of siteground but also know some who have used MediaTemple (which from what I saw with a past client not to thrilled over).
There are times when I can just reach out to support and they take care of stuff I do'nt feel like dealing with
I used a few others WAY back in the day. I'm sure I'll get up to date on all of them when I go to wordcamp next month and I can present what I learned
I have also used WPEngine and they are great! We mainly use GoDaddy when we get a choice.
We usually use Bluehost, mainly because of their support.
Weâ€™ve been big fans of Siteground after switching from Media Temple. Their support is good and getting setup is pretty straightforward/simple.
